Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a dark-grey pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and partially red in section, the interior is covered with a brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394697) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394697)
